content: As an AI language model, I don't have brand or product preferences. However, there are many popular headphones on the market specifically designed for working out. Some good features for workout headphones include a secure fit, water-resistant or sweat-proof materials, and wireless or true wireless options to avoid cords getting in the way. Some examples of popular workout headphones are the Bose SoundSport Wireless, Jaybird X4 Wireless, Powerbeats Pro, Jabra Elite Active 75t, and Sony WF-SP800N. Be sure to research the features that are most important to you and read reviews before making a purchase.
